popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate, direct effects
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Rune of Breaking
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you gain the Rune of Breaking, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you gain the Rune of Balance, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Rune of Regeneration
data.description: You call upon a regenerative rune, restoring 1700 health over 15 seconds to your target.

data.name: Rune of Preservation
data.description: A defensive rune which wards you from your target, reducing all damage that they deal to you by 50% for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from Stuns, Staggers and Knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Rune of Life
data.description: Restores life to a slain ally, reviving them with 20% of their health.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.

data.name: Swift Runes
data.description: Removes the cooldown of Rune of Cleansing, but increases the cost to 40 Action Points.

data.name: Rune of Cleansing
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Ailing
data.description: Your rune cleanses an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Increases your Corporeal resistance by 252.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Grimnir's Shield
data.description: You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Cleansing Vitality
data.description: Rune of Cleansing will now heal the defensive target for 387 over 9 seconds if an effect was successfully removed.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Rune of Sundering
data.description: A rune which ruptures the ground underfoot, knocking back targets within 30 feet of you. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Regenerative Shielding
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Regeneration has a 25% chance to increase the target's armor by 1056 for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Rune of Insanity
data.description: Inflicts 600 damage to the target and reduces their Action Points by 200.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Blessing of Grungni
data.description: Critical direct heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Mountain Spirit
data.description: Increases the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1320 and resists by 504 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Potent Runes
data.description: Rune of Striking and Rune of Immolation are now undefendable.

data.name: On Your Feet!
data.description: Rune of Life, Rune of Sanctuary and Grimnir's Fury will heal the target for 114 health over 5 seconds and will restore 70 Action Points when the target is resurrected.

data.name: Rune of Rebirth
data.description: Self Heal for 1200 then an additional 2403 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Sundered Motion
data.description: Rune of Sundering's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds, and it will now apply a 40% movement reduction for 10 seconds to all those hit.

data.name: Thick-Skulled
data.description: Rune of Mending and Rune of Serenity can no longer be set back when casting.

data.name: Oath Rune of Sanctuary
data.description:
Increases the targeted group member's Toughness by 80 for 1 hour. The rune holder will then be able to resurrect themselves with 20% health if killed within the next 10 minutes. Doing so will remove the Oath Rune.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 428 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Striking
data.description: Your rune calls down a bolt of electricity, dealing 389 Elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Grungni's Gift
data.description: Grungni blesses your target, restoring 382 health.

data.name: Oath Rune of Power
data.description:
Increases the target group member's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 80 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate to inflict 330 Elemental damage to a target.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Rune of Fire
data.description: Your rune releases a scorching blast, inflicting 330 Elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Rune of Restoration
data.description:
Your rune infuses the target with vitality, restoring 1258 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Protection of the Ancestors
data.description: Increases the target group member's Wounds by 160 for 60 seconds, healing them for the value of the additional HP gained.

data.name: Runic Blasting
data.description: Increases the critical chance of Rune of Fire, Grungni's Gift, and Rune of Striking by 15%.

data.name: Master Rune of Fury
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within the 100 feet of the Rune of Fury have a 20% chance to gain 50 AP whenever they activate an ability.

data.name: Ancestor's Blessing
data.description: Healing abilities have a 25% chance to also increase your target's AP by 50. This effect will not work on yourself.

data.name: Rune of Fortune
data.description: Deals 438 Elemental damage to your target and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Nullification
data.description: Critical direct damage hits place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Binding
data.description: Wounds your target for 360 Elemental damage and Staggers the target for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Rune of Ending
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and then heals all group members within 100 feet for all damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Immolation
data.description: You set your target ablaze, burning them for 860 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Shielding
data.description: A shielding rune which absorbs up to 825 damage over 10 seconds. When the effect fades, the target recovers 247 health.

data.name: Rune of Mending
data.description: Restores 370 health, then continues to restore 445 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Oath Rune of Iron
data.description:
Increases the targeted group member's Initiative and Willpower by 80 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 712 Elemental damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Spellbinding Rune
data.description: A potent rune which suppresses magic, silencing and wounding your target for 535 Elemental damage over 4 seconds.

data.name: Immolating Grasp
data.description: Each tick of Rune of Immolation has a 25% chance to drain 30 Action Points from the target and snare them by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Master Rune of Speed
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Speed have their buildup times reduced by 0.25 seconds.

data.name: Earth's Shielding
data.description: Each attack against an active Rune of Shielding will randomly debuff one of the attacker's stats by 120 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rune of Burning
data.description: You channel a powerful series of runes around your target which project searing flame into them, dealing 1890 Elemental damage over 6 seconds and snaring them by 40% for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Efficient Runecarving
data.description: While under the effects of your Rune of Breaking; you gain 10% disrupt strikethrough and each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Rune of Fate
data.description: Deals 1659 Elemental damage over 24 seconds and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Valaya's Shield
data.description: Heals your groupmates within 100 feet 2394 health over 15 seconds and gives 375 Action Points over 15 seconds

data.name: Rune of Might
data.description: Your rune transmits a surge of power through the ground, dealing 270 Elemental damage to all targets within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Oath Rune of Warding
data.description:
Increases all of the targeted group member's resistances by 252 for 1 hour. The rune holder may activate it to inflict 488 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
You may only give a player one Oath Rune, but players may bear multiple Oath Runes of different types at the same time.

data.name: Rune of Serenity
data.description: Heals your target for 729 health over 9 seconds, and will then bounce to and heal other allies within 30 feet of the previous target. This effect will not apply itself to the same target more than once, and will heal up to 6 people.

data.name: Rune of Cleaving
data.description: A burst of force erupts from your rune, dealing 732 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to targets 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Blessing of Valaya
data.description: Heals all group members within 100 feet for 898 health.

data.name: Extended Battle
data.description: Increases the area of effect of Rune of Cleaving and Rune of Battle by 50%.

data.name: Master Rune of Adamant
data.note: You may only have 1 Master Rune active
data.description: Inscribes a Master rune into the ground for 30 seconds. Heals Groupmates within 100 feet of the Rune of Adamant for 213 health every 3 seconds while the Master rune is active.

data.name: Concussive Runes
data.description: Rune of Cleaving grows ever more potent and now also reduces Armor by 990.

data.name: Rune of Battle
data.description: Buffs you or a friendly player with a pulsing area of effect that deals 375 Elemental damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within to 30 feet for 15 seconds.

data.name: Ancestor's Echo
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to 712 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Grimnir's Fury
data.description: Resurrects all fallen groupmembers within 30 feet, and does not cause Resurrection Sickness.  Anyone resurrected by this effect will regain 50% of their hit points.

data.name: Rune of Skewering
data.description: Deals 2400 damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you.
